85.question: On top of BERT does the RNN layer work better or the transformer layer?

4-Table2-1.png: On top of BERT, the transformer layer works better as indicated by the higher values in the table.</s>

Based on the table, the transformer layer works better than the RNN layer on top of BERT. This is evident from the higher scores for 'RoBERT', 'ToBERT', and 'Fisher' when using the transformer layer.</s>
4-Table3-1.png: On top of BERT, the transformer layer works better as it has higher values for all three datasets compared to the RNN layer.</s>
Based on the table, the transformer layer (ToBERT) works better than the RNN layer (RoBERT) when fine-tuned with BERT, as it has higher scores in all three categories.</s>
